## Leef (Żyj)

### Tekst

Piosenka  [@mozart:KV183] ,, fff 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
nl <- readLines(con = "./data/Leef.NL.txt", encoding = "UTF-8")
pl <- readLines(con = "./data/Leef.PL.txt", encoding = "UTF-8")
help <- read.csv("./data/Leef.help.txt", header = F, stringsAsFactors = F, encoding = "UTF-8")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results = "asis"}
 for(i in c(1:length(nl))){

   cat(line)
    }
```

### Pomoc językowa


```{r, echo=FALSE, results = "asis"}
 for(i in c(1:nrow(help))){
   cat(paste(help[i,1], help[i,2], sep = " "))
   cat("  \n")
 }
```
